name: Space Rocks... in Space!
description:
Space Rocks... in Space!

This game is in development. At the moment it's very barebones, has a few bugs, doesn't have any audio, and uses free assets from the Unity store.

How to play
  • Press spacebar or click/tap let half of the screen to fly up. Release to fly down. 
  • Click or tap the right half of the screen to shoot.
  • Don't get hit by asteroids and don't fly out of bounds.

This wasn't really designed for mobile. Touch controls can be a bit wonky depending on your device. Multitouch is required on mobile devices.
